import React from "react"; import { Link, Outlet } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Host() { const[vanList ,setVanList] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { fetch("/api/vans") .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setVanList(data.vans)) }, []) const vansData = vanList.map(van => { return ( <>

{van.name}

${van.price}/day

Edit

) }) return ( <>
Dashboard Income Vans Reviews

Welcome!

Income last 30 days Details

$2260

Review score 5.0/5 Details

Your listed Vans View all

{vansData}
) }
